connectWalletPrompt.title: Connect Your Wallet to Get Started
connectWalletPrompt.description: Connect your wallet to view your dashboard, manage your funds, and start planning for your retirement.

rewards.title: Monthly Yield
rewards.description: Your earnings available for this month.

claimToast.title: Yield Claimed!
claimToast.description: You have successfully claimed ${{amount}}. It has been added to your balance.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Milestones you've reached on your journey.

ant.name: Ant
ant.description: Contribute for 7 days in a row.

turtle.name: Turtle
turtle.description: Contribute for 30 days in a row.

elephant.name: Elephant
elephant.description: Contribute for 100 days in a row.

eagle.name: Eagle
eagle.description: Contribute for 365 days in a row.

growth.title: Investment Growth
growth.description: Projected growth of your initial investment.

history.title: Transaction History
history.description: A record of your deposits and earnings.

deposit.title: Deposit Funds
deposit.description: Choose your preferred method to add funds to your CryptoPrev account.

pix.scan: Scan the QR code with your bank's app to pay.

success.title: Deposit Successful
success.description: Your funds have been received and are being put to work.

withdraw.title: Withdraw Funds
withdraw.description: Enter the amount you wish to withdraw to your connected wallet.
withdraw.addressDescription: Funds will be sent to your connected wallet.

success.title: Withdrawal Initiated
success.description: Your funds are being processed and will be sent to your wallet.

lockup.title: Configure Your Plan
lockup.description: Choose the plan that best fits your goals. Longer plans offer higher yields.

success.title: Plan Updated
success.description: Your new lock-up period is {{count}} months.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Your AI-powered guide to CryptoPrev and Decentralized Finance.

topics.whatIsCryptoPrev: What is the purpose of CryptoPrev?
topics.whatAreTheRisks: What are the risks of DeFi?

faq.error: Sorry, there was an error fetching the explanation. Please try again.

placeholder.title: Your AI-powered suggestions will appear here.

planner.description: Get a personalized retirement plan powered by AI.

form.title: Your Financial Goals
form.description: Tell us about your goals, and our AI will create a custom plan for you.

results.title: Your Personalized AI Plan
results.description: Here is the step-by-step plan our AI has generated for your goals.

growthChart.title: Projected Growth
growthChart.description: This chart illustrates your potential investment growth over time.

form.rateDisclaimer: Rate is simulated and does not include fees.

proofOfFunds.title: Proof of Funds & Transparency
proofOfFunds.description: We believe in full transparency. Here is a live overview of our platform's key metrics.
proofOfFunds.reservesDescription: Total assets currently managed and invested across all DeFi protocols.
proofOfFunds.usersDescription: Number of active users earning yield on the platform.

onChain.title: On-Chain Verification
onChain.description: Verify our reserves directly on the blockchain using the wallet addresses below.
